description: This PHP source file provides the frontend interface and client-side scripting for editing port forwarding rules, including form fields for service parameters, validation, and AJAX submission.

methods.name: populateIPv6Addr
methods.description: Parses an IPv6 address string into an array of its segments, handling compressed notation (::).

methods.name: IsBlank
methods.description: Checks if all input fields with a specific prefix are empty.

methods.name: GetAddress
methods.description: Concatenates IPv6 address segments with a separator.
